title: Method in PlanetModel to describe type of ellipsoid
description:
Hi Karl Wright,

In order to decide which type of circle to use (GeoStandardCircle or GeoExactCircle), users might need to know what kind of Planet are dealing with (if planet is a sphere or not). It might have sense to add a method in PlanetModel where the planet describes it self.

Thanks!
